post:
Looking around in our stock it came to my attention that we have 25 IPs sitting around literally doing nothing on a node that is underloaded (used primarily for storing backups). So we've decided to offer a one time limited offer to only LET/LEB... a $10 annual or $5.50 semi-annual VPS package:

64 MB of Guaranteed RAM
128 MB Burstable
1 CPU Core (@1.8 GHz + (on 2.5 GHz+ cores))
5 GB of Storage
150 GB of Bandwidth
1 IP Address

Secure Order URL: https://www.bluevm.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=52

Location: Continuum Datacenter in Nevada
Ping IP: 205.134.228.126

Quick note: These plans aren't customizable or upgradable to any of our other plans. (AKA once you have it, you can't change up to a larger plan and get a discount, you have to order the larger plan). These plans aren't upgradable because of their limited slots/sale time and the limited availability of the server we're placing them on. Once we're out we aren't going to restock. This sale is for LEB/LET only for the first 24 hours, after that we'll post it on a few other forums.
